General.Name: ESG Global Impact Capital Inc
General.Description: ESG Global Impact Capital Inc., is a venture capital and private equity firm specializing in early stage, growth capital, debt and equity investing. The firm typically invests in the following sectors: Consumer Products in the Health Care Sector , medical devices, nutraceuticals and nutritional products, business services and logistics; education and training; and emerging technologies. It seeks to invest in companies that have capital requirement between CAD 0.25 million ($0.26 million) and CAD 2 million ($2.04 million) and have Asset to Revenue ratio of less than 40%. It seeks to invest in the form of convertible debentures and prefers to take a board seat or observation rights in its portfolio companies. It only seeks minority stakes. ESG Global Impact Capital Inc. was founded in February 2010 and is based in Vancouver, Canada and formerly known as Block One Capital Inc.
General.Address: 925 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3L2
